alert.note: Alert for Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Woodford and northeastern McLean Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gridley, or 15 miles southwest of Pontiac, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chenoa around 430 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 178 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
